title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 25
description:
IN this chapter, we really start to get some useful understanding of why technology can be so awful, but how it doesn't need to be. And in this chapter, we get a real felt sense of what it's like to operate in the world with Quality as base reality. Applied Quality!
Clips courtesy Lee Glover
